title: for the love of god make players pre select role in casual!
body: I'm over people autolocking roles that you called first or having to rush to call a role or even other team mates who lose their role because they couldnt "ctr-v" quick enough and either play stupid on purpose or cant play the role they are forced into and really hate it or suck at it. and on those time some spaz ragers and picks a role thats already locked in and someone really has to take the 5-15or more minute ban to save everyone from a horrible game. .please please do this

replies.body:
Agree.
My computers pretty old as well, still functions great in game but I always join the room last and never actually get to choose my role
I just hate the premades that steal roles when you have clearly called them already (hell i am in one of those games right now)
Draft normals are a thing right? I am not hallucinating that when i play right?
